## File

```javascript
var File = require('vinyl');

var coffeeFile = new File({
  cwd: "/",
  base: "/test/",
  path: "/test/file.coffee",
  contents: new Buffer("test = 123")
});
```

### isVinyl
When checking if an object is a vinyl file, you should not use instanceof. Use the isVinyl function instead.
